name: Product Lising
description: List 4 producds based on category or product IDs. The category has highest priority.

attribute_definition_groups.name: List of Product IDs
attribute_definition_groups.description: Specify up to 4 products IDs for lising the products. Separate the procucts by comma + space (', ') and do not put comma at the end. The category has highest priority.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Category
attribute_definition_groups.description: Specify the category for lising the products.
